mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fire Fighters at a Fire, 1993
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Fire fighters at the scene of a fire using their fire truck ladder at full extension in the air and using hoses from atop it to help put out the fire on the higher floors of the building, the photograph taken during the day is dated for 1993, the rest of the photographs are undated
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
